DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of onabotulinumtoxinA (BOTOXÂ®) compared with placebo as treatment for major depressive disorder (MDD) in adult females.
DOC.brief_title: OnabotulinumtoxinA as Treatment for Major Depressive Disorder in Adult Females
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe major depressive disorder Prior treatment with botulinum toxin of any serotype for any reason Use of antidepressant medication for depression within 2 weeks of study Diagnosis of Myasthenia gravis, EatonLambert Syndrome, Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
